Articles.Content: Specifically, I was wondering if there were any mods to use so I can keep comnet constellations, but not need a connection for probes/pilotless vessels to function?

I think that could be handled by the difficulty setting in-game already?  "Probes require signal for control" or some such.  I think you'd still need connection to transmit science, but that sounds like what you're looking for.
that would be helpful, i'll post any updates i have
